location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that he had disposed of all the Bengal bills, transmitting a statement of Colonel Macdonald's accounts with the Residency, and reporting that the money in the accounts were currently available in Tomans but could be made available in Rupees if required.
